parameters.text: =Generate a viral short description about the {{ $('GAME').item.json.first3Capitalized }} {{ $('GAME NAME').item.json.extractedText }} {{ $('GAME Version').item.json.extractedText }} {{ $('Video TYPE').item.json.lowercaseWords[0] }} {{ $('Video Item').item.json.extractedText }} {{ $('Video Category').item.json.extractedText }}

messageValues.message: =Generate a viral short description about the  {{ $json.cleaned }}

parameters.command: =ffmpeg -sseof -0.1 -i "{{ $('Code in JavaScript').item.json.path }}" -frames:v 1 "/home/node/{{ $('GAME').item.json.first3Capitalized }} {{ $('GAME NAME').item.json.extractedText }} {{ $('GAME Version').item.json.extractedText }} {{ $('Video TYPE').item.json.lowercaseWords[0] }} {{ $('Video Item').item.json.extractedText }}_last_frame.jpg"
